summary: Adds a Weapon into Skyrim that is similar to Dwemer Greatsword but its not
descriptionHtml:
[color=Red][size=3]Name          : [/size][/color]Dragon Greatsword
[color=Red][size=3]Version       : [/size][/color]2
[color=Red][size=3]Date          : [/size][/color]08/19/12
[color=Red][size=3]Category      : [/size][/color]Weapons
[color=Red][size=3]Author(s)     : [/size][/color]Forzane
[color=Red]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

[color=Red][size=4]Description:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-------------------------[/color]
this mod makes a sword similar to the Dwemer Greatsword with a few upgrades to it stat wise(not god-like).  it has custom glow map on it and a retexture.

[color=Red][size=4]Location:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]----------------------[/color]
On top of The Throat of the World imbedded into the ground in front of Paarthurnax

[color=Red][size=4]---Installation:---[/size][/color]
[color=Red]--------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red][size=3]Manual Installation:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]---------------------------------[/color]
drop the MESHes and TEXTURES folder into ur Skyrim Data folder

[color=Red][size=4]---Uninstallation:---[/size][/color]
[color=Red]----------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red][size=3]Manual Uninstallation:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-----------------------------------[/color]
Remove the added files from ur MESH and TEXTURE folders



[color=Red][size=4]Known issues and bugs:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-----------------------------------[/color]
None

[color=Red][size=4]Incompatabilities:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-------------------------------[/color]
none that i know of as long as it does put anything in front of the Dragon lol

[color=Red][size=4]Contact:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]---------------------[/color]
contact me here on the Nexus Forzane

[color=Red][size=4]Credits:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]---------------------[/color]
Forzane
Bethesda

[color=Red][size=4]Tools Used:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]------------------------[/color]
[url=http://newvegasnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=40278]Pyr√≤s: GuideLines[/url]
[url=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope]NifScope[/url]
[url=http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/]Photoshop[/url]
Creation Kit, Available on Steam
[url=http://www.7-zip.org/download.html]7 Zip[/url]

[color=Red][size=4]Walkthrough:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-------------------------[/color]
IF you havent been to see Paarthurnax then continue with main quest until you do and you should see the sword stuck in the ground

[color=Red][size=4]Changelog:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]--------------------------[/color]
I have put the Sword in the Forge as Dwemer
its enchantable and Craftable now
i have also redone the glow map to make it a lil brighter and fixed a few mess ups

[color=Red][size=4]Legal and licensing:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]---------------------------------[/color]
First ask for my permission.
author: Forzane
